languages.text: {n}Тень мрачной меланхолии касается ее лица.{/n} "Я совсем не помню детские годы. Висирь говорит, на то повлияли тренировки и травмы, полученные в боях. И что так происходит со всеми высшими ткачами. Все, что я помню, связывает меня лишь с культом Кровавой паутины и моими собратьями".

{n}A melancholy shadow passes over her face.{/n} "I remember nothing of my childhood. The Vizsier says this is because of my training and the injuries I received in battle. He told me it is the fate of all high spinners. The only memories I have are of the Bloodspun Web, and the brothers and sisters who serve the cult alongside me."
languages.original_text: {n}Тень мрачной меланхолии касается ее лица.{/n} "Я совсем не помню детские годы. Висирь говорит, на то повлияли тренировки и травмы, полученные в боях. И что так происходит со всеми высшими ткачами. Все, что я помню, связывает меня лишь с культом Кровавой паутины и моими собратьями".

traits.locale_text: {n}A shadow of melancholy passes over her face.{/n} "I remember nothing of my childhood. The Vizsier says it is because of my training and the injuries I received in battle. Such is the fate of every high weaver, he told me. My every memory leads to the Bloodspun Web and my brothers and sisters in service."

{n}A shadow of melancholy passes over her face.{/n} "I remember nothing of my childhood. The Vizsier says it is because of my training and the injuries I received in battle. Such is the fate of every high weaver, he told me. My every memory leads to the Bloodspun Web and my brothers and sisters in service."

{n}A melancholy shadow passes over her face.{/n} "I remember nothing of my childhood. The Vizsier says this is because of my training and the injuries I received in battle. He told me it is the fate of all high weavers. The only memories I have are of the Bloodspun Web, and the brothers and sisters who serve the cult alongside me."

He told me it is the fate of all high weavers. The only memories I have are of the Bloodspun Web, and the brothers and sisters who serve the cult alongside me."

{n}A melancholy shadow passes over her face.{/n} "I remember nothing of my childhood. The Vizsier says this is because of my training and the injuries I received in battle. He told me it is the fate of all high spinners. The only memories I have are of the Bloodspun Web, and the brothers and sisters who serve the cult alongside me."

{n}A melancholy shadow passes over her face.{/n} "I remember nothing of my childhood. The Vizsier says this is because of my training and the injuries I received in battle. He told me it is the fate of all high spinners. The only memories I have are of the Bloodspun Web, and the brothers and sisters who serve the cult alongside me."

languages.text: {n}Su rostro se ensombrece por la melancolía.{/n} «No recuerdo nada de mi infancia. El Visir lo atribuye a mi entrenamiento y a las heridas que sufrí en combate. Según me dijo, es el destino de todos los sumos tejedores. Los únicos recuerdos que conservo son de la Red Sanguinolenta, y de los hermanos y hermanas que servían conmigo al culto».
languages.original_text: {n}A melancholy shadow passes over her face.{/n} "I remember nothing of my childhood. The Vizsier says this is because of my training and the injuries I received in battle. He told me it is the fate of all high spinners. The only memories I have are of the Bloodspun Web, and the brothers and sisters who serve the cult alongside me."

traits.locale_text: {n}Su rostro se ensombrece por la melancolía.{/n} «No recuerdo nada de mi infancia. El Visir lo atribuye a mi entrenamiento y a las heridas que sufrí en combate. Según me dijo, es el destino de todos los sumos tejedores. Los únicos recuerdos que conservo son de la Red Sanguinolenta, y de los hermanos y hermanas que servían conmigo al culto».

languages.text: {n}彼女の顔に、憂鬱げな影が落ちる。{/n}「子供の頃のことは何も覚えていないの。ヴィジールによれば、訓練と戦いで負った傷のせいだとか。高位の織り手の宿命だと言われた。唯一の思い出は、ブラッドスパン・ウェブと、共に教団に仕える兄弟姉妹のこと」
languages.original_text: {n}A melancholy shadow passes over her face.{/n} "I remember nothing of my childhood. The Vizsier says this is because of my training and the injuries I received in battle. He told me it is the fate of all high spinners. The only memories I have are of the Bloodspun Web, and the brothers and sisters who serve the cult alongside me."

traits.locale_text: {n}彼女の顔に、憂鬱げな影が落ちる。{/n}「子供の頃のことは何も覚えていないの。ヴィジールによれば、訓練と戦いで負った傷のせいだとか。高位の織り手の宿命だと言われた。唯一の思い出は、ブラッドスパン・ウェブと、共に教団に仕える兄弟姉妹のこと」

languages.text: {n}她的脸上掠过了一抹忧郁的阴影。{/n}“关于我的童年，我已经不记得了。宿老告诉我，说这是因为我接受了训练，还在战斗中受过伤，所以才忘记了自己的过去。他告诉我，所有高阶织网者都难逃这样的命运。我唯一的记忆就是织血罗网的一切，以及与我一起侍奉不死之神的兄弟姐妹们。”
languages.original_text: {n}A melancholy shadow passes over her face.{/n} "I remember nothing of my childhood. The Vizsier says this is because of my training and the injuries I received in battle. He told me it is the fate of all high spinners. The only memories I have are of the Bloodspun Web, and the brothers and sisters who serve the cult alongside me."

traits.locale_text: {n}她的脸上掠过了一抹忧郁的阴影。{/n}“关于我的童年，我已经不记得了。宿老告诉我，说这是因为我接受了训练，还在战斗中受过伤，所以才忘记了自己的过去。他告诉我，所有高阶织网者都难逃这样的命运。我唯一的记忆就是织血罗网的一切，以及与我一起侍奉不死之神的兄弟姐妹们。”

languages.text: {n}Ein melancholischer Schatten huscht über ihr Gesicht.{/n} "Ich erinnere mich an nichts aus meiner Kindheit. Der Wesir sagt, das liege an meiner Ausbildung und den Wunden, die ich im Kampf davongetragen habe. Er meint, das sei das Schicksal aller hohen Spinner. Ich erinnere mich lediglich an das Blutgesponnene Netz und an die Brüder und Schwestern, die zusammen mit mir im Kult dienen."
languages.original_text: {n}A melancholy shadow passes over her face.{/n} "I remember nothing of my childhood. The Vizsier says this is because of my training and the injuries I received in battle. He told me it is the fate of all high spinners. The only memories I have are of the Bloodspun Web, and the brothers and sisters who serve the cult alongside me."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ein melancholischer Schatten huscht über ihr Gesicht.{/n} "Ich erinnere mich an nichts aus meiner Kindheit. Der Wesir sagt, das liege an meiner Ausbildung und den Wunden, die ich im Kampf davongetragen habe. Er meint, das sei das Schicksal aller hohen Spinner. Ich erinnere mich lediglich an das Blutgesponnene Netz und an die Brüder und Schwestern, die zusammen mit mir im Kult dienen."

languages.text: {n}Une ombre de mélancolie passe sur son visage.{/n} « Je ne garde aucun souvenir de mon enfance. À en croire le vizir, c'est à cause de mon entraînement et des blessures reçues au combat. D'après lui, c'est le lot de tous les hauts tisseurs. Les seuls souvenirs qu'il me reste sont tous liés à la Toile de Sang et aux frères et sœurs qui servent le culte à mes côtés. »
languages.original_text: {n}A melancholy shadow passes over her face.{/n} "I remember nothing of my childhood. The Vizsier says this is because of my training and the injuries I received in battle. He told me it is the fate of all high spinners. The only memories I have are of the Bloodspun Web, and the brothers and sisters who serve the cult alongside me."

traits.locale_text: {n}Une ombre de mélancolie passe sur son visage.{/n} « Je ne garde aucun souvenir de mon enfance. À en croire le vizir, c'est à cause de mon entraînement et des blessures reçues au combat. D'après lui, c'est le lot de tous les hauts tisseurs. Les seuls souvenirs qu'il me reste sont tous liés à la Toile de Sang et aux frères et sœurs qui servent le culte à mes côtés. »

He told me it is the fate of all high spinners. The only memories I have are of the Bloodspun Web, and the brothers and sisters who serve the cult alongside me."

languages.text: {n}Bir anlığına Kibellah'nın yüzünden hafif bir melankoli okunuyor.{/n} "Çocukluğuma dair hiçbir şey hatırlamıyorum. Vezir, bunun eğitimim ve savaşta aldığım yaralar olduğunu söylüyor. Tüm yüksek dokurların kaderinde varmış. Sadece Kanipi Ağı'nı hatırlıyorum, bir de tarikatta beraber hizmet ettiğim yoldaşlarımı."
languages.original_text: {n}A melancholy shadow passes over her face.{/n} "I remember nothing of my childhood. The Vizsier says this is because of my training and the injuries I received in battle. He told me it is the fate of all high spinners. The only memories I have are of the Bloodspun Web, and the brothers and sisters who serve the cult alongside me."
